"http://www.vegguide.org/region/52/entries", "is_country": "0", "entry_count": "0"}, "comments": [{"user": {"veg_level": "3", "name": "veggieinspain", "website": "http://www.veggieinspain.com", "uri": "http://www.vegguide.org/user/8486", "veg_level_description": "vegetarian", "bio": {"text/html": "

I'm a vegetarian and I live in Barcelona. I made a vegetarian food website for those living or traveling in Spain and for those who simply enjoy healthy vegetarian cuisine. Sorry I have not translated into Spanish, however, I am going to in the future. Please join our facebook and a newsletter to help us, we're a nonprofit organization and just do this because we love it!

", "text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext": "I'm a vegetarian and I live in Barcelona. I made a vegetarian food website for those living or traveling in Spain and for those who simply enjoy healthy vegetarian cuisine. Sorry I have not translated into Spanish, however, I am going to in the future. Please join our facebook and a newsletter to help us, we're a nonprofit organization and just do this because we love it!"}}, "last_modified_datetime": "2011-02-03T20:06:34Z", "body": {"text/html": "

Veggie in Span is a non-profit vegetarian food website for those living or traveling in Spain and for those that simply like healthy vegetarian cooking.

", "text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext": "[http://www.veggieinspain.com|Veggie in Span] is a non-profit vegetarian food website for those living or traveling in Spain and for those that simply like healthy vegetarian cooking."}}, {"user": {"veg_level": "0", "name": "Stephanie Bain", "veg_level_description": "not telling", "uri": "http://www.vegguide.org/user/3451"}, "last_modified_datetime": "2010-07-25T14:48:39Z", "body": {"text/html": "

My friend and I are keeping a blog of vegan food while we travel throughout Spain.

", "text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext": "My friend and I are keeping a [http://vegansinspain.wordpress.com/|blog of vegan food] while we travel throughout Spain. "}}, {"user": {"veg_level": "4", "name": "Ramona", "image": {"mime_type": "image/jpeg", "files": [{"width": "35", "uri": "http://www.vegguide.org/5f75f8/user-images/88-small.jpg", "height": "40"}, {"width": "88", "uri": "http://www.vegguide.org/5f75f8/user-images/88-large.jpg", "height": "100"}]}, "website": "http://www.ExploreVeg.org", "uri": "http://www.vegguide.org/user/88", "veg_level_description": "vegan", "bio": {"text/html": "

I live in Portland, OR. I am a philosophy professor at Pacific University, Oregon. I teach lots of cool ethics classes including a class on "Animal Ethics," and classes on Environmental Ethics, Ethics and Society, and Ethics Medicine and Health Care.

I tend to give higher ratings to places that are vegan and vegetarian, that have good desserts, and that have reasonable prices. I usually don't care at all about service; I usually don't comment on it unless it's amazing or awful. I tend to take off some points if the place makes hard to tell what's vegan. I tend not to like typical American food and I love Chinese, Vietnamese, and Thai food. I have a weakness for European pastries.

I am interested in ethics, teaching, activism, farmed animal issues, environmentalism, simple living, social justice issues, global inequalities, public transportation, ethics, activism, crafts (especially making stuff out of garbage), and eating sweets.

", "text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext": "I live in Portland, OR. I am a philosophy professor at Pacific University, Oregon. I teach lots of cool ethics classes including a class on "Animal Ethics," and classes on Environmental Ethics, Ethics and Society, and Ethics Medicine and Health Care. I tend to give higher ratings to places that are vegan and vegetarian, that have good desserts, and that have reasonable prices. I usually don't care at all about service; I usually don't comment on it unless it's amazing or awful. I tend to take off some points if the place makes hard to tell what's vegan. I tend not to like typical American food and I love Chinese, Vietnamese, and Thai food. I have a weakness for European pastries. I am interested in ethics, teaching, activism, farmed animal issues, environmentalism, simple living, social justice issues, global inequalities, public transportation, ethics, activism, crafts (especially making stuff out of garbage), and eating sweets."}}, "last_modified_datetime": "2007-06-19T14:34:51Z", "body": {"text/html": "

Also see http://www.restaurantesvegetarianos.es/
